pros: Great for personal bests; Propulsive ride; Very comfortable; Versatile for short and long runs; Amazing lockdown; Airy upper; More stable than v1; Long-lasting; Less annoying noise
cons: Expensive for sure; Still slightly unstable on corners; Hard to slip on; Heavier and less magical than v1
RR_verdict: The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 2 confirms all the qualities that made the first edition one of the best shoes—for some, the best ever—for racing marathons. It’s still incredibly fast, cushioned, and comfortable, plus it earned some stability and versatility. Overall, we are once again convinced that this is a fantastic performance-oriented choice. That is if money is not an issue.
awards: Top pick in best Nike Flyknit running shoes, Top 30% most popular running shoes
